meanings.definition: A domesticated hoofed mammal of the horse family with long ears and a braying call.
meanings.sent1: The donkey carried the heavy load up the hill.
meanings.sent2: I saw a donkey at the farm with long ears.
meanings.sent3: The donkey tried to sing along with the rooster's crowing.
meanings.sent4: She's stubborn as a donkey when it comes to changing her mind.
meanings.sent5: The donkey's braying echoed through the valley.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a donkey and make the same mistake twice.
meanings.sent2: He acted like a donkey by ignoring the warning signs.
meanings.sent3: The donkey in the office always forgets his keys.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a donkey after realizing her error.
meanings.sent5: Being a donkey in this situation will only lead to trouble.
